metadata.title: CVE-2020-14443 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in accountancy/customer/card.php in Dolibarr11.0.3 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commandsvia the id parameter.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
